lead_paragraph: The actor fell hard for Ross Bleckner’s “Sea and Mirror,” but in a dispute he says the gallery owner Mary Boone sold him a copy passed off as the original.

headline.print_headline: Was Alec Baldwin a Victim of Paint and Switch?
headline.main: Paint and Switch? Did Alec Baldwin Pay $190,000 for the Wrong Picture?

snippet: The actor fell hard for Ross Bleckner’s “Sea and Mirror,” but in a dispute he says the gallery owner Mary Boone sold him a copy passed off as the original....
abstract: Actor Alec Baldwin accuses art dealer Mary Boone of intentionally selling him copy of Ross Bleckner painting Sea and Mirror and leading him to believe it was original, touching off controversy that has reverberated throughout art world; conflict points to murky transactions in largely unregulated art market.
